endpoint_events.description: Core endpoint security events from EDR/EPP solutions

fields.name: event_type
fields.description: Type of endpoint event (process, file, registry, network)

fields.name: severity
fields.description: Severity level (critical, high, medium, low, info)

fields.name: event_type
fields.description: File operation (create, modify, delete, rename, copy)

fields.name: query_type
fields.description: Query type (A, AAAA, MX, TXT, etc.)

cloud_audit_logs.description: Cloud platform audit logs (AWS, Azure, GCP)

fields.name: indicator_type
fields.description: Indicator type (ip, domain, url, hash, email)

fields.name: data_type
fields.description: Sensitive data type (PII, PHI, PCI, IP)

security_alerts.description: Aggregated security alerts from all sources

fields.name: log_level
fields.description: Log level (DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR, FATAL)

fields.name: attack_type
fields.description: Attack type (SQLi, XSS, LFI, RCE, etc.)
